A third letter to F. Lewis Sabran, Jesuit wherein the defence of his challenge concerning invocation of saints is examined and confuted. Gee, Edward, 1657-1730.
[2], 14 p.
Printed for Ric. Chiswell ..., London : 1688.
Attributed to Edward Gee. Cf. BM. "Imprimatur, April 10, 1688. Guil. Needham." Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
